text.div:
Open mHealth to FHIR Device Modality ValueSet

The modality whereby the measure is obtained. Choice of sensed|self-reported .

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://www.fhir.org/guides/mfhir/CodeSystem/omh-device-modality

name: OmhDeviceModalityValueSet
title: Open mHealth to FHIR Device Modality ValueSet
description: The modality whereby the measure is obtained.  Choice of sensed|self-reported .
